title: US Urges PM Modi To Raise Ukraine "Sovereignty" With Putin During Meet
content: The United States called Monday on Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi to emphasize Ukraine's territorial integrity as he met in Russia with President Vladimir Putin on the eve of a NATO summit in Washington.
summary: The United States called Monday on Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi to emphasize Ukraine's territorial integrity as he met in Russia with President Vladimir Putin on the eve of a NATO summit in Washington.

title: 2024 Could Be World's Hottest Year As June Breaks Records
content: Last month was the hottest June on record, the EU's climate change monitoring service said on Monday, continuing a streak of exceptional temperatures that some scientists said puts 2024 on track to be the world's hottest recorded year.
summary: Last month was the hottest June on record, the EU's climate change monitoring service said on Monday, continuing a streak of exceptional temperatures that some scientists said puts 2024 on track to be the world's hottest recorded year.

title: Storm Beryl Kills 2, Knocks Out Power As It Churns Across Texas
content: Tropical Storm Beryl's howling winds and torrential rain killed at least two people, closed oil ports, grounded hundreds of flights and knocked out power to more than 2 million homes and businesses in southeast Texas on Monday.
summary: Tropical Storm Beryl's howling winds and torrential rain killed at least two people, closed oil ports, grounded hundreds of flights and knocked out power to more than 2 million homes and businesses in southeast Texas on Monday.

title: US Regulator Orders Inspection Of Boeing Airplanes Over Oxygen Mask Issue
content: US aviation regulators said Monday that more than 2,600 Boeing 737 airplanes would need to be inspected, due to concerns that passenger oxygen masks could fail in emergencies.
summary: US aviation regulators said Monday that more than 2,600 Boeing 737 airplanes would need to be inspected, due to concerns that passenger oxygen masks could fail in emergencies.

title: All About TSMC, Trillion-Dollar Taiwanese Chip Giant
content: Taiwanese semiconductor titan TSMC briefly joined a rarefied club of companies valued at more than $1 trillion on Monday.
summary: Taiwanese semiconductor titan TSMC briefly joined a rarefied club of companies valued at more than $1 trillion on Monday.

title: Putin Hosts PM Modi At His Official Residence For "Private Engagement"
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Monday evening welcomed Prime Minister Narendra Modi at his official residence at Novo-Ogaryovo for a "private engagement".
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin on Monday evening welcomed Prime Minister Narendra Modi at his official residence at Novo-Ogaryovo for a "private engagement".

title: Court Rejects Imran Khan's Petition For Weekly WhatsApp Call With Sons
content: A Rawalpindi court on Monday rejected Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) founder and former Prime Minister Imran Khan's plea for a weekly WhatsApp call with his sons, ARY News reported.
summary: A Rawalpindi court on Monday rejected Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) founder and former Prime Minister Imran Khan's plea for a weekly WhatsApp call with his sons, ARY News reported.

title: Political Turmoil, Airport Strikes: France's Challenges Ahead Of Olympics
content: France was plunged into political turmoil on Monday three weeks before hosting the Olympics, while a call for strikes at Paris airports added fresh uncertainty to the already tense build up.
summary: France was plunged into political turmoil on Monday three weeks before hosting the Olympics, while a call for strikes at Paris airports added fresh uncertainty to the already tense build up.

title: Biden Says "Firmly Committed" To Staying In Presidential Race
content: Joe Biden urged Democratic lawmakers Monday to either back his reelection campaign or challenge him at the party convention next month as the US president's reelection bid entered a critical week.
summary: Joe Biden urged Democratic lawmakers Monday to either back his reelection campaign or challenge him at the party convention next month as the US president's reelection bid entered a critical week.

title: Sunita Williams, Safe On Space Station, To Address Earth On July 10
content: Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams is safe and continues helping with research and maintenance of the International Space Station, said American space agency NASA.
summary: Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams is safe and continues helping with research and maintenance of the International Space Station, said American space agency NASA.

title: Rishi Sunak Makes Apology Calls To Ex-MPs After UK Election Loss
content: Former British prime minister Rishi Sunak spent the weekend calling the Conservative Party candidates who lost their seats in the general election last week to apologise for the party's worst performance at the ballot box, with just 121 seats in the
summary: Former British prime minister Rishi Sunak spent the weekend calling the Conservative Party candidates who lost their seats in the general election last week to apologise for the party's worst performance at the ballot box, with just 121 seats in the

title: Singapore Approves 16 Insects Including Grasshoppers For Human Consumption
content: The announcement has delighted industry players who have been gearing up for this long-awaited moment.
summary: The announcement has delighted industry players who have been gearing up for this long-awaited moment.

title: Watch: Indian Community's Big Welcome For PM Modi As He Lands In Moscow
content: Hundreds of people, including from the vibrant Indian community in Russia, lined up on both sides of the road as Prime Minister Narendra Modi travelled from the airport to his hotel in Moscow, on Monday.
summary: Hundreds of people, including from the vibrant Indian community in Russia, lined up on both sides of the road as Prime Minister Narendra Modi travelled from the airport to his hotel in Moscow, on Monday.

title: Ammunition Vending Machines Appear In US Stores Amid Increasing Gun Violence
content: There is no limitation on the quantity of ammunition customers can purchase and the vending machines would be restocked every two to four weeks.
summary: There is no limitation on the quantity of ammunition customers can purchase and the vending machines would be restocked every two to four weeks.

title: PM Modi Arrives In Russia To Hold Summit Talks With Putin
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived here on Monday on a two-day high-profile visit to Russia during which he will hold summit talks with President Vladimir Putin to review all aspects of bilateral ties and explore opportunities to further boost coop
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi arrived here on Monday on a two-day high-profile visit to Russia during which he will hold summit talks with President Vladimir Putin to review all aspects of bilateral ties and explore opportunities to further boost coop

title: Australian Woman Loses Unborn Baby, Dies Days Later After Severe Headaches
content: On June 24, she was declared brain dead and her life support was removed.

title: Pistols With Which Napoleon Intended To Kill Himself Sold For $1.8 Million
content: Two pistols that Napoleon Bonaparte once intended to use to kill himself were sold in France on Sunday for 1.69 million euros ($1.8 million), the auction house said, with the government insisting that they stay in the country as national treasures.
summary: Two pistols that Napoleon Bonaparte once intended to use to kill himself were sold in France on Sunday for 1.69 million euros ($1.8 million), the auction house said, with the government insisting that they stay in the country as national treasures.

title: As PM Embarks On Russia Trip, His 2-Decade Old Photo With Putin Surfaces
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday embarked on a two-day visit to Russia, for the 22nd India-Russia Annual Summit.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday embarked on a two-day visit to Russia, for the 22nd India-Russia Annual Summit.

title: Opinion: US, UK, France, Iran: Why Are People Done With Their Governments?
content: From Joe Biden to Emmanuel Macron, politicians are scrambling to sustain support as new entrants make inroads into constituencies that have lost faith in the established order.
summary: From Joe Biden to Emmanuel Macron, politicians are scrambling to sustain support as new entrants make inroads into constituencies that have lost faith in the established order.

title: 36 Killed, Children's Hospital Smashed In Russian Strikes On Ukraine
content: Russia struck cities across Ukraine on Monday with a missile barrage that killed three dozen people and ripped open a children's hospital in Kyiv, an assault condemned as a ruthless attack on civilians.
summary: Russia struck cities across Ukraine on Monday with a missile barrage that killed three dozen people and ripped open a children's hospital in Kyiv, an assault condemned as a ruthless attack on civilians.
